metadata.synopsis: One-liner for the Civilian7 from the Eastway's Wizards Vignette: a trio of young mages do a Gandalf and put on a light and sound show for passersby on the plaza in front of Sorcerous Sundries. This civilian is a chlild named Zerillo.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the civilian7 in the group of wizards and stragglers around the fountain nearby the Sorcerous Sundries.

0.speaker: Zerillo
0.text: Yay! When I'm older I'm going to become a wizard and zap all the goblins and ogres!

1.speaker: Zerillo
1.text: You! You're a creep. I'm going to become a wizard like those three and fry creeps like you with fireballs!

2.speaker: Zerillo
2.text: I'm going to grow up to be a great wizard and wade through my enemies with spells of fire and blood! Mostly fire.
